# SignSpeak - AI-Powered Sign Language Translation Platform

![SignSpeak](https://img.shields.io/badge/SignSpeak-AI%20Sign%20Language%20Translation-blue)
![Version](https://img.shields.io/badge/version-1.0.0-green)
![License](https://img.shields.io/badge/license-MIT-yellow)

## ğŸš€ Overview

SignSpeak is a revolutionary web application that bridges communication gaps between sign language users and non-signers using cutting-edge AI technology. The platform provides real-time sign language translation through webcam input, making communication accessible and seamless.

## ğŸŒŸ Features

### ğŸ¤– Advanced AI Translation
- Real-time hand gesture recognition using MediaPipe
- 21-point hand landmark detection
- 15+ common sign language gestures supported
- Confidence scoring for accurate translations

### ğŸ” User Management
- Secure user registration and authentication
- Personalized user dashboards
- Activity history and progress tracking
- Session management

### ğŸ“¹ Camera Integration
- Live webcam feed with hand tracking
- Visual hand landmarks overlay
- Gesture stability detection
- Anti-glitch algorithms

### ğŸ“Š Analytics Dashboard
- Translation statistics
- Accuracy metrics
- Learning progress tracking
- Gesture mastery levels

## ğŸ› ï¸ Tech Stack

### Frontend
- HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript (ES6+)
- MediaPipe Hands for hand tracking
- Responsive design with modern UI/UX

### Backend
- Node.js & Express.js
- MongoDB Atlas (Cloud Database)
- JWT for authentication
- bcryptjs for password hashing

### AI/ML
- Google MediaPipe Framework
- Real-time hand gesture recognition
- Machine learning models
